objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1A365D'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='#0D2137'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 0 Z' fill='#264673' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 540 Z' fill='#152A47'/><g transform='rotate(-45, 540, 540)'><rect x='-200' y='0' width='2000' height='4' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='-200' y='20' width='2000' height='2' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='-200' y='40' width='2000' height='1' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.2'/></g><g transform='rotate(45, 540, 540)'><rect x='-200' y='0' width='2000' height='4' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='-200' y='20' width='2000' height='2' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='-200' y='40' width='2000' height='1' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.2'/></g><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='80' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='100' fill='#FFBF40' opacity='0.1'/></svg>

objects.text:
• 14 Pockets & 3 Compartments
• Water Resistant Material
• Shock-Proof Tech Compartment
• Expandable Design (38L+8L)

product_details.description:
• Crafted with reverse coated polyester and microfibre. 
  • Water resistant. 
  • 14 pockets. 3 compartments. Designed to organise your work days and staycations. 
  • Front compartment comes with a retractable key holder, large slip pockets, pen pockets and a zippered pocket. 
  • Main compartment opens flat, to give you full access to your items. 
  • Comes with a spill-proof pocket for your toiletries. 
  • Elastic slip pockets along the walls of your backpack. 
  • Zippered mesh storage compartment makes room for your weekend staycation. 
  • Comes with an expansion system, which you can unzip to get an additional 8L of packing space. 
  • Shock-proof tech compartment that opens flat and protects your tech from those accidental drops. Fits up to a 16” laptop and an 11” iPad Pro. 
  • Contoured bottle pocket on the side for your water bottle/umbrella.
  • Quick access zippered pocket at the top. 
  • Hidden passport pocket at the back. 
  • Padded shoulder straps designed for all day comfort. 
  • Luggage sleeve that secures to any Mokobara luggage. 
  • Dedicated rain cover compartment at the bottom. Use the rain cover to protect your Mokobara from the rains.
  • Size - 44 x 29 x 23 cm

banner_details:
The banner features a bold, professional layout promoting a premium backpack product. It has a deep blue geometric background enhanced with subtle angular overlays, golden linear accents, and faint circular highlights to create depth. The top-left area includes a layered headline split into two text objects: a prominent gold-colored word (id: "heading") and a white subheading below it (id: "subheading"). A thin rectangle (id: "decorative") sits between the titles and the product details. The feature list (id: "description") appears in white bullet points, while the price (id: "price") is printed in large, eye-catching golden text. At the bottom left, a bold yellow call-to-action button (id: "cta_background") contains dark blue uppercase text (id: "cta"). The product image (id: "product_image") is placed on the right, sharply cut out and scaled to reflect prominence. 

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #1A365D
- Deep Navy: #0D2137
- Steel Blue: #264673
- Soft Marine: #152A47
- Gold / Amber: #FFBF40
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a minimalist yet bold aesthetic, centered around a deep navy blue (#2F3D5A) that dominates the backpack’s exterior. A matte charcoal gray (#3D414B) letter graphic adds a subtle yet stylish contrast without overpowering the main color. Accents in bright mustard yellow (#F2B705), visible on the handle and interior lining, bring a vibrant pop that draws the eye and enhances the modern appeal. Black (#1C1C1C) elements such as the straps and zipper trim integrate seamlessly, giving the design a cohesive finish. This color palette balances professionalism and sophistication, ideal for a sleek and dynamic advertisement banner.
